messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Sorry. Product description:  but based on the provided text alone

preferred_output.content: I tried to be bad, me to stay. Baby, I'm not staying, I just wanna play.

non_preferred_output.content:
Certainly. Here is ad copy for the word “Sorry,” based solely on the provided text:

---

**Sorry.**

A single word with the power to rebuild bridges, heal wounds, and open hearts. Whether whispered quietly or spoken boldly, “Sorry” marks the first step toward understanding and connection. Give the gift of sincerity. Say Sorry—because every relationship deserves a second chance.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Dr. Squatch. Product description:  natural bar soap for men with exfoliants and distinctive scents

preferred_output.content: Why women are attracted to this soap. My boyfriend would cheap out on his junk by smearing this body wash all over. So I found Dr. Squatch's soap that literally smells like the perfect man. The great thing about it is that there's real exfoliants built right in. You can see them all over the bar. Pine tar is his favorite because it smells rugged, and I love bay rum because it makes him smell like a tropical escape. His skin has never felt this soft and clean, plus he smells so sexy. Switch over to Dr. Squatch to see why women are obsessed.

non_preferred_output.content: Discover Dr. Squatch—the natural bar soap crafted specifically for men who demand more from their grooming routine. Each bar is infused with premium, naturally-derived exfoliants and distinctive, masculine scents, delivering a refreshing clean and unmatched skin feel. Elevate your daily ritual and experience soap the way nature intended. Dr. Squatch: Get clean, smell legendary.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Dr. Squatch. Product description:  natural soap specifically formulated for men with healthy ingredients and no harsh chemicals

preferred_output.content: I thought I had good hygiene until she told me. Stop putting harsh chemicals on your junk. So my girlfriend sent me all these articles about toxic chemicals being in my body wash. I mean some of these ingredients are banned in Europe. So I did some research and this pine tar soap from Dr. Squatch popped up. Apparently it's specifically made for men. It's full of healthy ingredients like shea butter, sea salt, oh and actual chunks of oatmeal to help clean off all the dirt clogging my pores. And you guys, the entire bathroom smelled like fresh pine trees. After just like one or two showers, I could feel a difference. So could my girlfriend because, well alright, you get it. Hands down pine tar is the best man. I don't know what your favorite is but this one's been working for me like a charm. You gotta get it.

non_preferred_output.content:
Introducing Dr. Squatch: Natural Soap for Men

Upgrade your daily routine with Dr. Squatch, the natural soap crafted specifically for men. Our proprietary formula harnesses only the finest healthy ingredients—no harsh chemicals, no artificial preservatives, and absolutely no compromises. 

Experience a powerful, refreshing clean while nourishing your skin with real botanicals and essential oils. Dr. Squatch enriches your shower with rugged scents inspired by nature, all while keeping your skin healthy and hydrated.

Choose Dr. Squatch—because men deserve better soap. Cleanse confidently, knowing you're using nature’s best.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Dr. Squatch. Product description:  natural men's body wash and soap made with natural ingredients for cleansing and exfoliation

preferred_output.content: So what kind of man are you? Body wash? It's full of toxic chemicals, stuff like hair mist, which is linked to infertility. I mean, guys, there's nothing less manly than risking your manhood. Dr. Squatch is made of natural ingredients, and women can't get enough of how these bricks smell on their men. Okay, if my guy used this, I would be showering together all the time. That smells really good. Really sexy. Guys, jump on this. You get to choose from over 15 unique scents made specifically for men. Like pine tar. It's made with natural ingredients like shea butter and sea salt, and it's even packed with little chunks of oatmeal for the perfect amount of exfoliation. Just enough to make your skin touchable without losing your edge. And gentlemen, guys are buying this stuff up fast. Better hurry up and grab yours before they sell out.

non_preferred_output.content: Experience the difference of true cleanliness with Dr. Squatch natural men’s body wash and soap. Crafted with nourishing natural ingredients, every bar and bottle delivers a refreshing cleanse and gentle exfoliation—leaving your skin feeling revitalized and free from harsh chemicals. Elevate your grooming routine with formulas designed specifically for men, blending robust scents and essential oils for an invigorating shower experience. Choose Dr. Squatch for the confidence that comes from healthier skin and authentic, natural care.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Alix. Product description:  personalized herbal supplement for PMS and menstrual symptom relief

preferred_output.content: 90% of people who take Alix in a clinical trial saw a reduction in PMS symptoms. My hormones didn't just affect me when I was on my period. Between the migraines and cramps when I was actually bleeding, I also had month-long acne and I just generally felt really moody and tired all the time. So I decided to give Alix a try. Alix is a completely natural blend full of herbs and botanicals that is custom to my body. All I had to do was take a quick 10-minute quiz to go over my month-long menstrual history and they actually showed the herbs that were going to be in my formula and why. For instance, for my blend there is angelica sinensis which is used for my cramps and my migraines. To discover your herbal blend, go take the 10-minute quiz and then tell someone who has periods.

non_preferred_output.content: Introducing Alix—a personalized herbal supplement expertly formulated to support your body’s natural rhythm and provide relief from PMS and menstrual symptoms. Alix combines clinically studied botanicals tailored to your unique needs, helping to reduce discomfort, balance mood, and promote overall well-being throughout your cycle. Experience the difference that customized care can make. Discover your Alix today and take the first step toward a more comfortable, harmonious period.

preferred_output.content: Three reasons why Haybud masks make the best gift. Number one, I've been using it myself for months and it has absolutely transformed my skin. Number two, it has amazing ingredients like hemp, green tea and avocado oil to rejuvenate the skin, leaving it feeling plump and supple. Number three, it is the cutest shade of green and it's such a vibe, I'm obsessed. It's the perfect Christmas present. Shop now and get 20% off all products this December.

non_preferred_output.content:
Introducing Haybud: the revolutionary facial mask designed to rejuvenate your skin with the natural power of hemp. Our carefully crafted formula harnesses potent botanical extracts and nourishing hemp to revitalize, hydrate, and restore your skin’s youthful radiance. Rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids, Haybud soothes and replenishes, leaving your complexion smoother, brighter, and glowing with vitality. 

Experience the next level of skincare. Reveal healthier, more luminous skin with Haybud—where nature and innovation meet for results you can see and feel.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Broya. Product description:  high-quality bone broth made from locally sourced meats and bones

preferred_output.content: What's up guys, I'm Tim. I'm the founder of Broya. I'm going to tell you a little bit about why I decided to start this brand. For years before I started Broya, I actually started sourcing high quality meats from local farmers about an hour outside of the city. You source directly from the farmer, you're getting everything. You're getting the muscle meats, the steaks, the organs, and the bones. I'm not going to lie, I had no idea what to do with these bones, so they just sat in the bottom of my freezer. Then I started doing a bit of research on bone broth, and I started to see that actually one of the best ways to get collagen protein is from bone broth. So I just started making it every single day. I started drinking about two cups every single day, and it was pretty clear to me right away that this was a game changer. Within a couple weeks, I noticed some immediate improvements in my gut health. And that's when Broya was born. Boom! I thought, man, the world needs to know about this. And there was no bone broths being sold in the grocery stores, at least no high quality ones.

non_preferred_output.content: Discover the nourishing difference with Broya. Our high-quality bone broth is expertly crafted from locally sourced meats and bones, ensuring exceptional flavor and wholesome nutrients in every serving. Whether you’re seeking a delicious, natural source of protein or a comforting addition to your daily wellness routine, Broya delivers purity you can taste and benefits you can feel. Savor tradition, support local, and experience bone broth elevated. Choose Broya—where quality meets nourishment.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for fairy light spirit tree. Product description:  decorative ambient light shaped like a tree that provides calming illumination for home décor

preferred_output.content: I saw this product going viral, it's the best gift idea. I thought this fairy light spirit tree was cute online, but in person it literally completes a room. The ambient light isn't too soft or overpowering, it is so calming. Whenever I press it on, it puts me in this nice mellow, relaxing mood. Plus it's super affordable and everyone that sees it wants to know where I got it from. You can't go wrong gifting a fairy light spirit tree anytime you want to impress somebody.

non_preferred_output.content: Transform your living space into a tranquil haven with the Fairy Light Spirit Tree. This decorative ambient light, masterfully shaped like a delicate tree, casts a gentle glow that soothes and inspires. Perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or meditation spaces, the Fairy Light Spirit Tree creates a calming atmosphere, seamlessly blending elegance and serenity into your home décor. Illuminate your surroundings with a touch of enchanting warmth. Discover the art of peaceful illumination today.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Shapermint. Product description:  high-waisted opaque leggings that provide body smoothing and comfort

preferred_output.content: Three reasons to buy high-waisted leggings from Shapermint. Number one, it is fully opaque and conceals your clothing. These are completely opaque. You cannot see through them and I'm going to do the squat test just to prove that you can't see anything. Number two, you're not wearing uncomfy jeans anymore. They're a complete game changer. I wear them every day because you can dress them up and dress them down and I'm telling you, your butt will look incredible. Number three, you won't have to worry for muffin tops. Because they're high rise, they come up just underneath my bra, which is perfect because it completely smooths out my midsection and my back and I don't have that muffin top that I used to have with other pairs of leggings. These are so good. You have to have them.

non_preferred_output.content:
[Transcript Copy]

Experience confidence and comfort every day with Shapermint’s High-Waisted Opaque Leggings. Thoughtfully designed to smooth and flatter, these leggings offer superior coverage and gentle shaping support for every body type. The high-waisted band ensures a secure, stay-in-place fit without digging in, making them perfect for all-day wear. Enjoy unmatched softness and a sleek silhouette, whether you’re at home, at work, or on the go. Elevate your wardrobe with leggings that blend comfort, style, and body-smoothing confidence—only from Shapermint.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Base Tights. Product description:  performance workout tights that are squat proof

preferred_output.content: These are comfiest tights. Originally designed as a minimal alternative to our highly supportive OG rep tights, bases become a cult classic fave in our community for a huge range of workouts across performance levels. So what's the secret sauce? Rep fabric. It starts with a solid base. Our signature rep fabric is squat proof, moisture wicking, and buttery soft. The waistband. This waistband is high rise and super soft. Perfect for any workout. Minimal seams. Base stays out of your way with minimal flat lock seams for that barely there feeling. And that's it. Our underdog all-rounder performance tight. Ready to go however you chase the vibe. If you're not sure on sizing, we have 30-day free and fast returns. Grab a couple of sizes and see what fits best. No fuss fitness, shop base tights.

non_preferred_output.content: Introducing Base Tights—the ultimate performance workout tights designed for those who demand excellence. Engineered with advanced, squat-proof fabric, Base Tights provide unwavering support and coverage through every movement. Experience all-day comfort, moisture-wicking technology, and a streamlined fit that empowers you to reach your personal best. Train with confidence. Move without limits. Choose Base Tights—where strength meets style.

messages.content: You are a copywriter at an ad agency that specializes in social media ads for TikTok and Instagram. You specialize in creating ads in the style of user-generated content, which are ads that appear to be organically created by individuals that use the product or service.
Write me the ad copy for a social media ad for Moon. Product description:  teeth whitening device and dissolving whitening strips for fast and convenient at-home teeth whitening

preferred_output.content: Want a teeth whitening product that actually works? You need this. The Moon Teeth Whitening Device. Advanced whitening up to 12 shades and results in just 5 minutes. It's super convenient with no hassle. The whitening device pairs with their easy-to-use dissolving whitening strips. First you take out the white strips. Next, take the whitening device and insert it into your mouth gently. The device will turn off after 5 minutes, then you can leave the whitening strips on for another 10 to fully dissolve. It's as easy as that, and will leave you with the most beautiful and white smile.

non_preferred_output.content: Experience a brighter, more radiant smile with Moon. Our innovative teeth whitening device, paired with dissolving whitening strips, offers fast and convenient at-home results. Simply apply and let our advanced formula work to gently lift stains, revealing visibly whiter teeth in just days. With Moon, confidence shines. Transform your smile—whenever, wherever.
